definition: Grouping category for AntibodyCOVIDTest, RTPCRTest, SnellenChart...

positive_examples: The doctor ordered a blood test to check for diabetes.
She failed the eye exam and needed new glasses.
The COVID-19 rapid test came back negative.
The PCR test confirmed the presence of the virus.
He had to take a vision test to renew his driver's license.
The antibody test showed she had been exposed to the disease.
negative_examples: The thermometer showed his temperature was normal.
She used a scale to weigh herself every morning.
The pH meter indicated the water was too acidic.
He checked his blood pressure with the cuff monitor.
The teacher graded the math quiz yesterday.
The driving test required parallel parking skills.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Thermometers, Scales, Gauges, Meters, Rulers
